source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04101_000010_ALGUS<tab>Who dares disturb the slumber of Argath Thadalfus, rightful king of Ivalice!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04101_000010_ALGUS“朕はイヴァリースの王　アルガスなり！
朕の眠りを妨げるはなにゆえか？”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04101_000011_ALGUS<tab>Descendants of House Beoulve? Then by my sword shall I banish your souls to the deepest hell!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04101_000011_ALGUS“貴様はベオルブ家の末裔か……？
ならば　朕　みずからの剣にて葬るのみよ！！”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04101_000020_ALGUS<tab>Where... Where am I? This body... It is not my own. Oh, gods, what have I done? Save me Ramza! Save me!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04101_000020_ALGUS“オレはいったい…？　どうしてここに……！？
なんだ…この身体は？　助けて…くれ…ラム…ザ……！”
